C

close() - Method in class event.Event
Closes the event, indicating that further processing should be stopped.
closed - Variable in class event.Event
 
compareTo(EventListener<E>) - Method in interface event.EventListener
Compares this event listener with another based on priority.

E

event - package event
 
Event - Class in event
Base class for events that can be used with the EventBus.
Event() - Constructor for class event.Event
 
EventBus - Class in event
EventBus facilitates the communication between different components in a decoupled manner.
EventBus() - Constructor for class event.EventBus
Creates a new EventBus with an empty subscriber mapping.
EventListener<E extends Event> - Interface in event
An interface for objects that listen for and respond to specific events.

P

priority() - Method in interface event.EventListener
Retrieves the priority of the event listener.
publish(T) - Method in class event.EventBus
Publishes an event to all subscribers interested in that event type.

S

subscribe(Class<T>, EventListener<T>) - Method in class event.EventBus
Subscribes a listener to receive events of a specific type.

U
